key_risks: Customer Concentration Risk: Heavy reliance on Apple Inc. for revenue
Supply Chain Vulnerabilities: Dependence on third-party manufacturers in Asia
Competitive Pressure: Intense competition from major semiconductor players
Regulatory and Trade Risks: Exposure to tariffs, export controls, and U.S.-China trade tensions
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing environmental footprint, including carbon neutrality and energy efficiency goals
social_issues: Responsible sourcing practices and compliance with ethical standards, including the Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act
governance_issues: Enforcement of high standards of business integrity and working conditions across the supply chain
